long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BWB Down with flexible filtering/mass-renaming options that make downloading files a lot easier & productive.

This is a light and unobtrusive download manager and batch/bulk/mass downloader.

 Good for:
 Assist the user in batch downloading various resources from the web.
